attributes.action: do more to combat & bring to justice 'live' scammers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an influx of scammers (419/advance fee/black money scam/credit card fraud/ ID fraud/ you name it e..t.c) they have bogus ID's & fake E.U passports & are residing in the UK & operating scams /theft by deception/various other fraud/theft be it bank fraud, financial fraud. The police havent adequate resources to bring the culprits to justice & these organised criminals are getting away. I suggest the govt take live photos (& hold in a main database) of everyone entering the UK from places like Cameroon, Nigeria,ghana & places like Holland. They can change their names far too easily but their face is harder to change. These scum are responsible of the ongoing increase of organised crime that is spreading all over the UK & extending to other countries too.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
